Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.directory

Class FacultyDirectory

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.directory.FacultyDirectory
public class FacultyDirectory extends Object
Maintains a directory of all faculty at the university. All faculty have a unique id.
Author:
Diego Sarria

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    FacultyDirectory()
    Creates an empty faculty directory.

  • Constructor Details

    • FacultyDirectory

      public FacultyDirectory()
      Creates an empty faculty directory.

  • Method Details

    • newFacultyDirectory

      public void newFacultyDirectory()
      Creates an empty faculty directory. All faculty in the previous list are lost unless saved by the user.

    • loadFacultyFromFile

      public void loadFacultyFromFile(String fileName)
      Constructs the faculty directory by reading in faculty information from the given file. Throws an IllegalArgumentException if the file cannot be found.
      Parameters:
      fileName - file containing list of faculty
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if file cannot be read properly

    • addFaculty

      public boolean addFaculty(String firstName, String lastName, String id, String email, String password, String repeatPassword, int maxCourses)
      Adds a Faculty to the directory. Returns true if the faculty is added and false if the faculty is unable to be added because their id matches another faculty's id. This method also hashes the faculty's password for internal storage.
      Parameters:
      firstName - faculty's first name
      lastName - faculty's last name
      id - faculty's id
      email - faculty's email
      password - faculty's password
      repeatPassword - faculty's repeated password
      maxCourses - faculty's max courses.
      Returns:
      true if added
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if password is null, empty, or does not match the repeat

    • removeFaculty

      public boolean removeFaculty(String facultyId)
      Removes the faculty with the given id from the list of faculty. Returns true if the faculty is removed and false if the faculty is not in the list.
      Parameters:
      facultyId - faculty's id
      Returns:
      true if removed

    • getFacultyDirectory

      public String[][] getFacultyDirectory()
      Returns all faculty in the directory with a column for first name, last name, and id.
      Returns:
      String array containing faculty first name, last name, and id.

    • saveFacultyDirectory

      public void saveFacultyDirectory(String fileName)
      Saves all faculty in the directory to a file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - name of file to save faculty to.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if file cannot be written

    • getFacultyById

      public Faculty getFacultyById(String id)
      Returns a Faculty object from the faculty directory if the id matches.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the faculty
      Returns:
      the Faculty object with the matching id, or null if no match is found
